# graylog_event_notification (Data Source)

Fetches information about a specific Graylog event notification.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "graylog_event_notification" "example" {
  id = "507f1f77bcf86cd799439011"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the event notification. Either `id` or `title` must be provided.
- `title` (String) The title of the event notification. Either `id` or `title` must be provided.

### Read-Only

- `description` (String) The description of the event notification.
